1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: The first of two special programmes set at Monkey World in Dorset - a farewell tribute to Jim Cronin, founder of one of the largest ape and monkey rescue centres in the world. We look back at Jim's conservation dream, how he fought to build the park and how he devoted his live to rescuing and rehabilitating primates.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The second of two special programmes set at Monkey World in Dorset - a farewell tribute to Jim Cronin, founder of one of the largest ape and monkey rescue centres in the world. We look back at how he devoted his live to rescuing and rehabilitating primates. And look forward, with the team, to the development and future of 'Monkey World'.

We look back at Jim's conservation dream, how he fought to build the park and how he devoted his live to rescuing and rehabilitating primates.
